name: The Seven Rooms
description:
In The Seven Rooms you continously solve puzzles in space to teleport from room to room.

Lean back and enjoy over an hour of scifi puzzle action.

Note: There is gamepad support which was only tested with XBOX controllers. Might work with others or might not. =)

If you like this game, please consider donating to fund future development. There is a cool story and endgame content planned to be implemented. Thanks.
